:::: Gremlin turned his head towrds Hell Beast. ::: Commander, Marine is 
dead. My scanners show Demona did it. And the Ark is under attack...again.

::: Hell Beast snarled ::: DEMONA! Get to the bridge now!!!

::: The frail pink bot appeared in the doorway. She walked up to Hell Beast 
and glared at him. ::: Yes?

::: Hell Beast answered her with a swift slap in her pink face. Her head flew 
off and bounced across the bridge. :::

::: Hell Beast ::: Clean her up. Transanulas, I want you to....make her more 
respectful. She will pay of Marine.

::: Gremlin ::: And the Ark?

::: Hell Beast ::: I trust the Newcomers will destroy it. No need to get our 
own hands dirty. Black Aracnia, Jackle, and Gremlin, go to the Cybertronian 
Fire and let them know we dont welcome them here. Do as much damage as you 
can, but do not get yourselfs scrapped. Clear?

::: They salute and disembark. :::
